channel.title: Bash on Phill Sparks
channel.description: Recent content in Bash on Phill Sparks

item.title: PHP Id
item.description: #!/bin/bash # A handy script to insert $Id$ comments in PHP files. # # Author: Phill Sparks <me@phills.me.uk> # License: Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 2.0 UK: England & Wales # License URL: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0/uk/ case $# in 1);; *) echo "Usage: $0file";exit;; esac; # File exists? if [[ -e $1 ]]; then # File already has $Id$ in it? if grep -q '\$Id.*\$$' $1 ; then echo "$1[skipped]" else # After the first <?
